subject: Add provider health check system
description:
Create a health check module for voice providers:
- New file: `services/voiceNexus/healthCheck.ts`
- Add `checkSTTHealth()`, `checkReasoningHealth()`, `checkTTSHealth()` functions
- Implement `getProviderHealth()` method in orchestrator
- Return status: available/degraded/unavailable with latency metrics
- Surface health status in VoiceManager UI component

Critical files:
- services/voiceNexus/orchestrator.ts
- components/voice/VoiceManager/index.tsx
